name: Slushii Dating Sim
description:
Slushii Dating Sim is a game where you date a man named Slushii.

The game is very short (around 5 minutes) and was developed in less than a week.

The game was mostly made to test ren'py, and is mostly a joke.

It doesn't have any music or sound, but you could pretend if you played loud restaurant sounds and faint classical music.

There might be a few bugs, if you see any tell me and I'll try my best to fix them
